Posts.Title: My Favorite Book
Posts.decription: Picture this. Dragons, self-discovery, strength, and a smart women. Do I even need to say more?... Nope!

Posts.Title: The Art of Playing the System
Posts.decription: I understand this book is not based on actual events. However, it holds so much truth, and it highlights what women sometimes have to do to succeed. Fortunately, times have become more progressive.
